code: import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/cjs/exports/Platform";export function isJest(){return!!process.env.JEST_WORKER_ID;}export function isChromeDebugger(){return!global.nativeCallSyncHook||global.__REMOTEDEV__;}export function isWeb(){return Platform.OS==='web';}export function shouldBeUseWeb(){return isJest()||isChromeDebugger()||isWeb();}export function nativeShouldBeMock(){return isJest()||isChromeDebugger();}
